website_summaries.verdict: Transform your outdoor fire pit into a jeweled oasis. Stay warm and cozy among 1/2" glass pieces.
pros: bag of glass pieces can transform your fire pit into a soothing environment
Pieces are smooth around the edges and uniform in aesthetic
cons: We love the clarity but would also love more coverage

customer_reviews.title: We are DELIGHTED!
customer_reviews.text: We combined this Caribbean blue (10 lbs) with (20 lbs) cobalt blue reflective for a perfect blend of color - similar to a peacock! Other reviews did not state the beautiful green that cannot be seen until the fire reflects as shown in the photo. The weight on both were a little more, delivery was timely. We are VERY happy!!! Does not have to be cold outside to enjoy the ambiance of a fire --- and a nice glass of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Garland

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent quality firepit glass
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd order-I needed more than I thought the first order. I also bought another color. I did what another review suggested, getting 2 colors and mixing them. In this video (if it loads), I have two different blues going on. I just ordered the copper and red, but haven't used them yet. These glass beads have not burst or exploded even once. The glass that came with my pit burst all the time! These are much prettier, too.
customer_reviews.author: PoleGirl2

customer_reviews.title: Starfire glass Caribbean Blue
customer_reviews.text: This Starfire glass looks phenomenal in our fire pit. 10 lbs wasn't quite enough to cover a 18" X 18" X 1" deep area, so we bought another 5 lbs of the Starfire White glass. Adds a great ambiance to the custom made pit that we did.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Belote

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This Starfire glass is very pretty in color, even when our fire pit is not in use. When it is in use, the flames make the glass look like it is shimmery and has a water-like appearance. We purchased these to replace our lava rocks that came with our original fire pit, because the lava rocks did not hold any of the heat that was produced. The Starfire glass heats up quickly and seems to radiate more heat as we sit around our fire pit. They also cool very quickly. All of the stones were uniform and whole, we had no jagged edges to worry about. Ten pounds of glass filled our pit nicely. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: This glass is beautiful!! Went with the darker blue and lighter ...
customer_reviews.text: This glass is beautiful!! Went with the darker blue and lighter blue, 10lb of each. Perfect amount and a major improvement from the lava rock. It had a little popping and crackling the first time we turned on the fire pit but after multiple uses its flawless. The wife loves it and it really makes the deck pop!! Great product!!.
customer_reviews.author: Model 3 Performance

customer_reviews.title: Great reflective finish and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to add more glass to the red pebbles we already had in our firepit, just to add a bit more volume, only to find out no one carries the red anymore. Decided this black would be a good mix and it worked out. They both have the same reflective finish and when it’s dark out the flicker from the flames makes it look like running water. A really cool effect. The pebbles were good quality - no chips or broken bits in the bag. No issues with popping either but we usually keep the flame between low and medium, so don’t know how they’d react to high heat. All in all we’re very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SLKgirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glass beads to change the look of my gas fireplace & change out the ceramic logs. My firebox is 19" x 36" wide at the front & 4 bags filled it perfectly. The color of the bead are gorgeous! It transformed my ordinary gas fireplace into a modern clean looking focal point. Wonderful product and it arrived quickly. Would recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! That's about all I have to say
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! That's about all I have to say. We purchased a new 40"x40" propane fire pit and instead of boring lava rocks I wanted something different. I bought two colors, 10lbs each, and combined they fill the pit great and look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SeekDestruction

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. I bought this for my outdoor fire pit. The rocks that it originally came with were large and clear and very sharp. These are nice because they are round so you don't have to worry about being poked with sharp rocks. They seem to do well in the heat also. I don't hear cracking noises as I did with the previous fire pit rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Much better than lava rock!
customer_reviews.text: Removed the lava rock from my fire pit and replaced it with the Caribbean Blue Reflective Starfire glass and immediately loved it. When you look into the fire they look like melting glass beads (very cool looking). The reflections, and look of my fire pit is now perfect! Highly recommend this product, especially over the dull, boring lava rock that I removed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty in our fire pit! Knock on wood, none have cracked in the handful of times we've used it (summer in Vegas). I laid 10lbs of pebble glass over the gray lava rocks that came with our fire pit. No regrets! :)
customer_reviews.author: C.T.S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so gald I ordered these beautiful glass rocks for our new firepit
customer_reviews.text: I'm so gald I ordered these beautiful glass rocks for our new firepit. I chose the Carribean Blue Luster thinking that the color would go well with our pool and I was right. The rocks look amazing when the fire is on, almost like fluid. They're definitely a huge improvement from the lava rocks that came with the firepit. I'm thinking about getting more for the fireplace in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: MediaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as the picture but still beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Caribbean blue but what I got looks more like the picture of the Pacific blue. Either way it's gorgeous and I'm happy with it. I have a table top gas fire pit & 10 lbs worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. Used with a propane based flame, so they do get a little soot built up. They typically do clean up after a few rain showers.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our firepit
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous. We updated our gas fire pit that had cement logs and added a new gas ring. We used lava rock under the ring and applied 20 pounds of glass over the top. It is absolutely beautiful and reflects the flames nicely. There were a few bare spots where the lava rock was visible so I ordered another 10 pounds to apply. It's not cheap but I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stones
customer_reviews.text: Added just the flare we were looking for to our fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel R. Silveira

customer_reviews.title: So pretty..
customer_reviews.text: So pretty ... no broken ones ... takes a lot more than one bag to fill my little firepit thingy. A 10 pound tub of crushed glass goes much further, but doesn't look nearly as good IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: enamelcamel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I know these are for a firepit, but they worked perfect for my project. I cannot review them for the intend purpose so please keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S

customer_reviews.title: The boring lava rocks that come with also pop which can ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW did this add to our fire pit. The boring lava rocks that come with also pop which can be dangerous. These are just gorgeous and no popping. It did take two bags to fill the pit. The pieces really pick up the light of the fire and just add a whole new dimension.
customer_reviews.author: gaj

customer_reviews.title: wow!!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the titanium 1/2" color/size for my fireplace face lift i was working on. I got the H burner too and installed that to the gas line and covered it with this fire glass, it looks amazing!!! A million times better for sure, it's very reflective, def makes a statement now. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Black glass is so much better than clear glass in my fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Black glass is so much better than clear glass in my fire pit. Better yet, every black rock arrived safely packaged - no broken pieces or glass chards
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: They do not hold color
customer_reviews.text: They do not hold the color after one use in my fire bowl. They are now clear. Maybe they are good for a fish bowl or decorative pepples but not for fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glass for firepit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different colors to mix as I heard they glow differently in the fire. Great product, Mr. Patio really backs up their service, and the glass adds a great look to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: These are such an upgrade from lava rock. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are such an upgrade from lava rock. I purchased mine for an outdoor fire bowl and am now considering replacing the lava rock in my gas fireplace as well. I purchased the Caribbean blue color and it is exactly as pictured in person.
customer_reviews.author: Book Junkie

customer_reviews.title: This is what I ordered and looks beautiful, but I also ordered Caribbean Blue Reflective to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is what I ordered and looks beautiful, but I also ordered Caribbean Blue Reflective to mix with this, and received only Pacific Blue Reflective in both packages. They look nice, but I wanted to mix the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Plooster

customer_reviews.title: excellent.
customer_reviews.text: 30 lbs of the teal and 10 lbs of the blue to fill a 28 inch fire pit. It is gorgeous and distributes the flames nicely. No issues with popping. Have had it on a few times for and hour or so each. Picture attached (daytime)...
customer_reviews.author: Blair Henderson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Works and looks great in my propane fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice addition to my fire pit table. Reflects the fire!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Sure beats the crap that comes with the fire unit
customer_reviews.text: Attractive ... especially when the fire is on. Sure beats the crap that comes with the fire unit. Be careful of using reconditioned butane bottles. Buy a new one and have it filled. Some of the Rhino's leak!.
customer_reviews.author: billavet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and beautiful to watch..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these with the starfire white reflective glass. Wished I would have bought more blue but both together look incredible. The reflection from the flame of our outdoor fire pit is so very mesmerizing. Almost look like they are liquid. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: GolfNUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Love the vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something different than the lava rock that was included with our new propane fire pit, which is a natural-looking stone. By adding the glass rocks, we were able to add a modern touch to the rustic feel of the fire feature. As a bonus, these glass rocks added a vibrant touch of color that coordinates with the cushions of our patio set.
customer_reviews.author: WH7126

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to our new deck furniture - the color ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to our new deck furniture - the color matches all the accents we picked. The fire pit looks brand new with them and I love to watch the fire through the glass. Beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and beautiful to watch..
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these with the cobalt blue. Wished I would have bought more blue but both together look incredible. The reflection from the flame of our outdoor fire pit is so very mesmerizing. Almost look like they are liquid. We love them!

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 10 pounds originally then came back to order 20 more pounds as I liked the full look better

customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Great color. Matches my pool tile so looks great. Arrived really fast. Double boxed, good packaging. Would definitely purchase again

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful look better in person we have 2 fire pits and love the look of this glass!

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor fireplace replacement glass
customer_reviews.text: great product at a friendly price. Looks great in the fireplace. Thank you very much."

customer_reviews.text: Love it put it with Blue ones in a fire pit and it looks like water when the fire is on.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous in my fire table. I got matching pillows for the surrounding couch. Looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Shine reflects fire light.
customer_reviews.text: The rocks were perfect. We put them in our Firefox, and they look great. The mirror shine reflects the fire light. Beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Great glass and color
customer_reviews.text: I ended up needing to order 2 bags for my fire pit. I underestimated what 10# looked like. I love the color.

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The color is what I expected, just as pictured. They look fabulous in my propane fire pit. Would recommend this upgrade from the more rustic lava rocks.

customer_reviews.title: Loving the firepit!
customer_reviews.text: This glass is beautiful! We filled the basin with pea gravel first, put this on top. Sparkles when the propane is burning.

customer_reviews.title: Love the sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Building a firepit on our patio and these were the crowning jewel. They were exactly what I was looking for and met all my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty and Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Lava Rock! The rocks almost look like they are melting in the fire. Very pretty. 10 lbs wasn't enough; just ordered another 10.

customer_reviews.text: The pieces were small and lots of crumbles like other reviews said. This is no different than the other cheap fire glass. Look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and color of these glass "Fire-Drops." We used them to replace our lava rock and they truly add a nice ambiance to our fire-pit.

customer_reviews.title: Love my fire glass
customer_reviews.text: Love my fire glass. So much prettier than the lava rock I replaced. Should have do that a long time ago.

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional designer but it took me a while figure out between brands and sizes and amount and colors. I am SO Happy, with this product. Came in 24 hours with Prime. Large and spectacular pieces, vibrant color with reflective silver side. My pool color is Aqua and I have same large contemporary glazed pots next to it... Have grey furniture and cushions and it looks amazing. It looks fresh and contemporary and glamorous... My fire pit is modern concrete round with opening in the middle about 27" but it is shallow, maybe 3-4" deep. I got 20 pound bag and going need at least one more bag of 10 pounds.

customer_reviews.title: Great glass - looks amazing.
customer_reviews.text: For the past two years I used the 3/4"-1" glass that came with my 55" Hex AZ Patio fire pit. This year I had to replace the ignitor, so I ordered so new glass. I went with this 1/2" glass and I must say, it looks amazing. Especially compared to the glass the fire pit came with, what a difference in quality. For reference - I ordered 30lbs for my 55" Hex and that was the perfect amount (so glad I ordered the extra 10lbs, was only going to order 20lbs). If your thinking about it - go for it - you wont be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: I remembered that I bought what looked like the same glass at the Dollar store for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the glass but the 10 pounds was not enough. At $3.50 per pound I thought there has to be a cheaper way to do this. I remembered that I bought what looked like the same glass at the Dollar store for my Beta fish tank. It was a 14oz bag which calculates out to $1.14 a pound. I went and bought 20 bags and put them in the firepit. They are working fine. I do not see any difference between the two products. I saved over $45. Choise is yours. I did not find any fault with this product.

product_meta.title: Golden Flame 10-Pound Fire Glass Fire-Drops 1/2-Inch Caribbean Blue Reflective
product_meta.description: Size:1/2 Inch x 10-Pounds| Color:Caribbean Blue Luster** New for 2019 ** Reflective Fire Glass Drops by Golden Flame is a Brilliant and Stylish addition for your fireplace or fire pit replacing traditional Gas Logs and Lava Rocks for a Modern, Elegant look! This Jewel-like Glass media produces mesmerizing flames that dance and flicker, transforming your fire feature into a spectacular work of art! Golden Flame is a high quality premium product, heads and shoulders above the many imitators crowding the market with inferior low grade fire glass products. All of our Fire Glass is made with a unique tempering and filtering process resulting in jewel-like Fire Glass with superior clarity and higher heat resistance so as to remain brilliant and radiant for generations to come! Unlike many imitators, Golden Flame is safe and clean to use. Our Fire glass will not melt, degrade or emit toxic fumes. There is also no soot, ash or smoke. --- ALL FIRE GLASS IS NOT CREATED EQUAL --- Insist on the Best. Insist on Golden Flame
feature_bullets: Golden Flame The Ultmate in Fire Glass Quality!
½" Fire-Drops are uniform in size producing Mesmerizing Reflective Flames
Superbly polished with a Warm, Radiant, Luminous Glow.
Premium Tempering process with consistent Jewel-Like color throughout
Replaces Existing Gas Logs & Lava Rocks. Very Safe and easy to install
